short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast, open and free-to-use new tab page for modern browsers.

long.am,ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
🌟 Welcome to Mue Tab, your ultimate new tab experience! 🌟

🚀 Fast, Free, and Highly Customisable 🚀

Transform your browser with Mue Tab – the innovative new tab extension that brings inspiration, productivity, and beauty to every new tab. 

✨ Highlighted Features ✨

💬 Inspiring Quotes – Open each tab with a hand-picked inspirational quote, or add your own custom quotes to brighten your day. 

🌅 Stunning Backgrounds – Enjoy a new, beautiful background every time you open a tab. With curated collections from Unsplash plus the Mue API

🎨 Custom Backgrounds – Personalise your tab with backgrounds from your computer or a custom URL. You can also set a custom colour or gradient to suit your style! 

🎉 Personalized Greetings – Receive warm greetings with your name and special events like birthdays and New Year's. 

🔍 Search Bar – Effortlessly search the web with a clean, autocomplete dropdown and voice support. 

🌐 Quick Links – Access your favourite websites instantly with customisable quick links. 

☀️ Weather Widget – Stay informed with weather updates, including temperature, humidity, and more. 

🌍 Multilingual Support – Mue supports multiple languages to make your experience seamless. 

🛍️ Marketplace – Discover and download free photo packs, quote packs, preset settings and curated collections from our community. 

...date, achievements and even more!

🔒 Privacy First – We believe in privacy and transparency therefore Mue does not collect personal data and is completely open-source at https://github.com/mue. 

👥 Community and Support – Join our supportive community on Discord or reach out via email, contact form, or X (Twitter). We’re here to help! 

📧 Email: hello@muetab.com
🌐 Contact Form: https://muetab.com/contact
💬 Discord:  https://discord.gg/zv8C9F8
🐦 X (Twitter): Follow @getmue

Mue Tab – Because Every New Tab Should Be a Work of Art 🎨🌟
